meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Lithuania.
meanings.sent1: I exchanged my euros for litu to buy souvenirs.
meanings.sent2: In Lithuania, you can use litu to pay for goods and services.
meanings.sent3: The litu in my pocket started singing a song about its value!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a shiny litu.
meanings.sent5: The litu jingled in my hand, reminding me of my trip.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional Fijian dance.
meanings.sent1: The dancers performed a beautiful litu at the festival.
meanings.sent2: Learning the litu dance requires grace and rhythm.
meanings.sent3: The litu dance made the audience burst into laughter unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as fluid as a litu swaying in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The litu dance told a story of love and unity.

meanings.definition: A type of ancient Roman coin.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a rare litu from ancient Rome.
meanings.sent2: Collectors seek out old litu coins for their historical value.
meanings.sent3: The litu coin rolled away, trying to escape the display case!
meanings.sent4: His words were like ancient litu, carrying wisdom of the past.
meanings.sent5: The litu coin gleamed under the museum lights, captivating visitors.
